seo_keywords: Dyson V11 filter sealing ring broken

problems.title: Filter Message won't clear
problems.description: The screen says 'Filter needs cleaning' even after washing it.
possible_causes: Fine dust is trapped deep in the filter media
solution_steps: Ensure filter dried for at least 24-48 hours.
Tap the filter firmly against a sink to dislodge fine dust.
If the message persists, the filter is saturated and must be replaced.

problems.title: Trigger Stuck / Not Working
problems.description: You pull the trigger but nothing happens, or it feels loose.
possible_causes: Internal plastic trigger component snapped (Design flaw)
solution_steps: If the battery lights don't turn on at all, check the battery.
If the trigger feels 'limp', the internal switch is broken. You need a replacement main body or a heavy-duty trigger fix.

faqs.question: Is it worth fixing the filter on a V11 Torque Drive / Animal?
faqs.answer: Yes. A replacement filter typically costs significantly less than a new $427 vacuum, and extending the life of your Dyson is eco-friendly.

faqs.question: How do I know if my V11 Torque Drive / Animal needs a new filter?
faqs.answer: Common signs include intermittent power and the device failing to complete a cleaning cycle.

faqs.question: Can I replace the filter on my V11 Torque Drive / Animal myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, this is a user-serviceable repair. Most replacements generally require just a screwdriver and about 10-20 minutes of time.
